00087 class EGS_RECTANGLE_EXPORT EGS_RectangleShape : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00088 
00089 public:
00090 
00091     EGS_RectangleShape(EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax, EGS_Float Ymin,
00092                        EGS_Float Ymax, const string &Name="",EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00093         EGS_SurfaceShape(Name,f), xmin(Xmin), xmax(Xmax), ymin(Ymin),
00094         ymax(Ymax) {
00095         EGS_Float tmp;
00096         if (xmin > xmax) {
00097             tmp = xmax;
00098             xmax = xmin;
00099             xmin = tmp;
00100         }
00101         if (ymin > ymax) {
00102             tmp = ymax;
00103             ymax = ymin;
00104             ymin = tmp;
00105         }
00106         dx = xmax - xmin;
00107         dy = ymax - ymin;
00108         otype = "rectangle";
00109         A = dx*dy;
00110     };
00111     ~EGS_RectangleShape() {};
00112     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00113         return EGS_Vector(xmin + dx*rndm->getUniform(),
00114                           ymin + dy*rndm->getUniform(),
00115                           0);
00116     };
00117 
00118 protected:
00119 
00120     EGS_Float xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, dx, dy;
00121 };
00122 
00130 class EGS_RECTANGLE_EXPORT EGS_RectangularRing : public EGS_SurfaceShape {
00131 
00132 public:
00133 
00134     EGS_RectangularRing(EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax, EGS_Float Ymin,
00135                         EGS_Float Ymax, EGS_Float Xmin_i, EGS_Float Xmax_i, EGS_Float Ymin_i,
00136                         EGS_Float Ymax_i, const string &Name="",EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00137     ~EGS_RectangularRing();
00138     bool isValid() const {
00139         return valid;
00140     };
00141     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00142         EGS_Float eta = rndm->getUniform();
00143         int j=0;
00144         while (eta > p[j]) {
00145             j++;
00146         }
00147         return r[j]->getPoint(rndm);
00148     };
00149 
00150 protected:
00151 
00152     EGS_RectangleShape  *r[4];
00153     EGS_Float            p[4];
00154     bool                 valid;
00155 
00156 };
00157 
00158 #endif
